name: Stronk
description:
STRONK puts you into the shoes of STRONK BOY. A Superhero who suffers from a terrible weakness. His powers are OUT OF CONTROL.

He cannot control his strength and breaks everything he touches! Can you help him escape from a villians lair?

Made for GMTK Jam 2020 in what was meant to be 2 days but ended up being more like 1.
